item.title: MHSCTF - General - Where the Wildcards Are 2
item.description: General - Where the Wildcards Are 2 - writeup Writeup Match all lowercase letters: [a-z] Match all lowercase letters which are followed by two or more capital letters then three or more digits: (the capital letters and digits should not be included in the match) a-z Match all numbers, letters, or underscores using the shortest possible pattern \w Flag: flag{m@tc#_mak3r}
